name: Halloween Haunt (elkkuli)
description:
Halloween is around the corner and you realise you don't have any decorations ! Before panicking you ask the townspeople for help.

Use WASD and mouse for controlling the player. Press E to interact with the villagers.

Created for Finnish College Jam #3.
